data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Marusik, Yuri M., Omelko, Mikhail M. (2017): Redescription of Micaria beaufortia (Araneae, Gnaphosidae), with notes on Afrotropical Micaria. Zootaxa 4294 (4): 462-470, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4294.4.5|4 occurrences
